comment: She was an amazing teacher, so sweet! Would definitely take this class.

Take her! She is the best professor! She is a little scattered, but attend class, keep up with homework and trust the process. If you have a 93 or higher you can exempt the final exam, VERY achievable. ( Also, she allows a cheat sheet on tests- and entire sheet of paper) Attendance is optional, but I HIGHLY suggest attending class.

I love love love Marla Bell downnn. Class was optional and she had like 3 different types of notes online for the lesson but You get points for coming to class. She made everything so easy and if you have issues with anything she will talk to you and figure something out. Take her!!!

GUYS PLEASE TAKE HER. She is the best. She explains everything extremely well. She does practice tests too which are SO HELPFUL. They look exactly like the real tests. AND she does cheat sheets like??? AND if you get a 95 or higher you get to exempt the final. This class is not homework heavy. Just show up and do your work and will 100% do great.

Dr. Bell is amazing! She truly cares about student success and student feedback. Grades consists of online homework on Aleks, optional take home practice tests, and 3 tests. Final exam can be exempted if your average is 95+ (very achievable). Attendance is optional and she posts all materials online. Come to class and do the homework!!!

She's an amazing professor and she cares and wants everyone to pass. You'll have 3 tests and practice test that are take home for each test. Homework will all be on ALEKS which helps with practice. She's very understanding and will help you out with anything you need. You also have the opportunity to exempt the final if you have a A. PLS TAKE HER!!

TAKE PROF. BELL! She is an amazing and caring professor. She only wants what's best for her students. She does use Aleks for homework assignments. Show up to class because she explains everything very well.

I took Professor Bell's STAT 1401 and I was able to get a high enough grade to exempt the final. She has visual guides that make it easy to understand if you are more of a visual learner. She doesn't mind going back and reviewing something as long as you ask. We had 3 tests 60% of the grade, a Final 20%, HW 10%, and 2 quizzes and project 10%.

Dr.Bell is hands down the best professor I have had at KSU. Dr.Bell is the nicest and most caring lady. You have 4 tests and around 2 quizzes per unit. All tests are in person but you get to use a cheat sheet (these help a lot). Some quizzes are take home. You also have HW for every chapter of the unit but the HW really helps you. TAKE DR.BELL!!

Highly recommend taking Professor Bell, I was very nervous initially taking this course because I am very bad at math. Ended up with a very high A. She is caring and explains the content very well. Attendance is not mandatory but helpful. Tests/quizzes are also straightforward and you can use a cheat sheet.
Very easy if you come to class, attendance not mandatory and gives multiples take home quizzes, 100% recommend.

Dr. Bell was great at teaching and a great professor overall. Would highly recommend to any and everyone! Very reliant on Aleks for almost all of the homework, but tests and quizzes are in person. Missing a lecture here or there will be fine, but consistently not going will negatively affect your grade.
She is the best teacher I have had here and she was so lenient with test/quizzes. She made more than half of them take home.
Dr. Bell is an amazing professor. She makes the material very easy to understand. She is always available via email in in-person. Do not take her kindness for granted. She is not soft.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: She's so sweet and very straightforward about the context of quizzes and tests. You'll do great if you do the homework and practice problems she provides. She tends to ramble during lectures but other than that a great professor.

Dr.Bell is an amazing professor, easy to understand lectures, Aleks homework, offers help outside of class, and lets you use a cheat sheet. First professor that I could actually grasp information from.

Dr. Bell is awesome and so sweet. Make sure you come to class because she explains it so well. She will always to work with you, but don't take advantage of her kindness. I'm honestly thinking about minoring in statistics because of this class. She makes it so easy to understand.

I loved having Dr. Bell this semester. She is such a sweet lady, cares a lot about her students, and is a great mathematician. She makes the material easy to understand and not only explains it well, but also is good at using real life examples and talking about why the stuff matters in real life. Easy A if you go to class and do the work.

SUCH A GEM!!! She is so sweet and caring. She is clear about how to pass her class and is available to help. Great communicator. HIGHLY recommend. If you get her, respect her and appreciate her. Explains everything in such a great way. She is funny and a great mathematician.  Do not miss on the opportunity to take her!

Shes such a sweet lady and you can tell shes wants the best for her students. Take her if you can. She actually teaches the material and gives you until the end of the semester to finish homework assignments. The only thing is you will only be able to get an 80% after the due date.
I love her!

Professor Bell is one of my favorite professors! As someone who is not the best at math, she makes it easy to understand and enjoyable. She also provides lots of example questions. We have some homework on Aleks but I believe that it is helpful, especially to practice before tests. Anyway, Dr. Bell is great and I hope I can take her again someday!

Dr. Bell is one of my favorite professors. She is extremely caring and if you need help with anything she is easily accessible outside of class. She made Statistics digestible and if you just do the work on ALECS and pay somewhat attention in class it will be a breeze.

Amazing professor, makes sure her students understand all the material and leaves no confusion in her material. I literally never did the ALEKS homework (had a 33% hw grade) and finished with an A+ because I aced all the exams due to how clear her teaching was in class. Quizzes and Exams are so easy if you show up and pay attention.

I took her for freshman seminar and she is the nicest person ever. Funny and caring, she tries her best to make the-frankly lacking- material of seminar engaging. We really didn't use the testbook except for the online exams. You could ask her about anything and she would have great advice, including helping with math homework. Definitely a gem!

I took her for freshman seminar, so the class was pretty much a joke. But she was such a sweet woman and she made a really boring class very enjoyable. We also never had to read the book (like most seminar classes require you to do). Since we never really had much to do in class, she would also help me with Calculus when we were dismissed early!

this is one of the best profs ksu has to offer especially for math and stats students. she is sweet and actually cares about her students, and her students love her for that! if you have the chance take her for sure

Such a sweet woman! I wish I could have taken the whole minor with her. She will give you everything you need to get an A and is a very fair grader. If you show up and do what you're supposed to you will do great. One of my favorite professors at KSU, she is also the associate dean for student success in math and science.
Just a sweetheart

She is a wonderful teacher. Her lectures can be a bit boring, but that could have a lot to do with the material she covered. She really does care about all of her students and will try to get to know you personally. Plus, she is easily accessible outside of class and will immediately respond to your emails.
Dr. Bell is a gift! Her teaching style is 'think out loud'; she gives ample opportunity to ask for help, and provides excellent notes and examples of the problems.
She is definitely the right person for the job.
Dr. Bell is THE BEST! This is the second time I took her and she makes everything really understandable. The projects are time consuming, but very doable. She will go out of her way to help you.

Awesome woman. She knows what she's talking about and if she does not she finds out and gets back to you. She tries really hard to be diverse and up to date with the softwares and how to use them. Very helpful and funny.

SUCH a nice lady, but when i went to class her style was a little confusing and disjointed. most classes are labs that we worked on our homework in, so you dont have to go if you understand what you are doing. if not she is very helpful in these lab nights!
A wonderful professor who really knows her subject inside out. Classes are interesting and the projects are very relevant.
Very sweet and helpful.  Easy class but you still learn.  I would highly recommend here.

Dr. Bell is the best stat teacher ever.  The class is very straight foward. Her teaching style is excellent she explains every single detail and actually walks you through the programs.4 homework sets, the lowest one is replace with an average of the highest 3.  A midterm and a final and the lowest one is replace with the average of the two.

take dr. bell! her midterm and final were a breeze. she tells you what's going to be on it.  she gives out 4 homework sets that involves using statistics  programs (EASY!!) and gives you a lot of time to work on them during class. i made an A in this class :)

Dr. Bell is a wonderful professor.  She is well prepared and explains all concepts in a way that is easy to understand.  We were well prepared for tests and she even offers a chance to earn extra credit.

This teacher discusses problems that you will see again on major test with the students.  She teaches new material, reviews difficult material, and gives many examples of problems to solve to improve student understanding.   The teacher makes her students feel encouraged to try to do best.
She is very sweet and really wants to help her students! A great professor to know if you need an override or help with math.  VERY FAIR!!!

She is one of the best teachers. She is very clear and will bend over backward to help you. Class was kind of boring only because she could teach something once and you would understand it and then keep on going over the same thing.
Great teacher and easy too. She's legally blind and she lets you use the book on the test because it's not like she can tell if you are cheating anyway.
The best.  Very nice and organized.  Strongly recommend.
she is very good!.great professor very patient.

Very nice and prepared teacher. Organized and concised. She knows how to teach. Best teacher ever! You will definetly learn a lot in her class. As long as you do your homework you'l get an easy A. She prepares you for tests. She has reviews. She is the best.
No Comments
Dr. M Bell is the best teacher I have ever had!  She really cares and will bend over backwards to help you.  Extreamly nice!
greatttt teacher, very easy! makes class fun, as long as you do quizzes and study from the quizzes you will make an A!
Dr. Bell made statitics much easier than a previous professor. She make sure that the entire class is doing well. Easy "A"!
Awesome teacher, such a nice person too.  I would take her for any math class.  I was late to her test one time and she let me come take it in her office.
